contentrichtext.text: '''[[:Category:Great Basin deserts|Great Basin desert]]''' may refer to any of the named deserts all or partly in the [[Great Basin]] (e.g., [[Great Salt Lake Desert]], [[Escalante Desert]], [[Mojave Desert]], etc.) or to: *[[Great Basin Desert]], a large area of the Great Basin which includes the Nevada salt deserts, 12 ecoregions in the Basin and Range valleys of Nevada; and the Central Nevada Desert, a hydrologic basin of several Nevada counties having <{{convert|10|in|mm|abbr=on}} annual precipitation *[[Great Basin Province]], in the Madrean Region of the Boreal Kingdom *[[Great Basin shrub steppe]], an ecoregion of the western United States *[[North American Deserts]], an EPA ecoregion generally corresponding to the Great Basin {{Deserts|state=collapsed}} {{geodis}} [[Category:Great Basin deserts]]
